EmailTemplate.name: BCBS OK acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Oklahoma Demographic Change Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Name_Submitter__c} ({!Case.Title_Submitter__c}), Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Oklahoma. This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, for {!Case.Name_of_Provider_Group__c}. Your request may take up to 30 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted with the Demographic Change Request Form.
To check on the status of your request or for any questions, contact 1-800-722-3730 or email "oknetworkmanagement@bcbsok.com". Sincerely,
Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Oklahoma
